title: WHAT THE ACTUAL FUCK RIOT!?
body:
THAT UDYR BLAZING THROUGH OBJECTIVES AT 20 MIN IS RETARDED

Baron? SOLO

Turrets? Butter

WTF 

I'm done. This is the most retarded thing I ever saw in this game. I'm done. If Riot think this is the state this game should be , to solo fucking kill a baron at 20 min? To destroy a turret like it's a minion? Fk this

I'm not saying he is the only one, but fuck this. It shouldn't be allowed

replies.body:
1. This is not remotely the first time we have junglers or champions that can solo barron at 20. Hell its not even the 2nd time uyder has been strong enough to destroy objectives.
2. All you have done for the last year is complain about the game. dog if your really not having fun take a break and return when you are not so burnt out.
3. back in my day Ap Shaco could solo dragon and barron on spawn. good times.
4. its gonna rotate outa meta and/or be nerfed when it becomes to oppressive just like it always has every time something stands out to much.
You could try not freefarm feeding him.
you should probably not let him get to that point tbh XD

There are a few things you can do.

1. Ban him
2. Play an assassin who can catch him out in his jg and set him behind early
3. Play a ranged champ that kites him
4. Play a tank and get thornmail/randuins

No matter which you choose you're significantly lowering his power if you play correctly.

Except BAN him, what the fuck it has to do with the post?

Did I say I can't kill Udyr? I'm saying he is taking objectives way too easy

> [{quoted}](name=GripaAviara,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=F2EtEFkX,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-06-03T22:17:35.668+0000)
>
> Except BAN him, what the fuck it has to do with the post?
> 
> Did I say I can't kill Udyr? I'm saying he is taking objectives way too easy

If you ban him you won't have to deal with his objective-taking prowless
As Illaoi I can solo Baron with three tentacles placed and my Ult.
